about_the_game:
You will control the knight as you move through the maze, choosing different directions and interacting with the surrounding objects that will help you progress through the game.

You have to control a medieval knight who, having found himself in a labyrinth underground, became the victim of a mysterious kidnapping. Your hero is faced with a variety of obstacles, scary creatures and deadly traps that await him at every turn. A very tangible feeling of claustrophobia will constantly accompany you during the game, increasing the tension and atmosphere.



The character has the ability to choose the direction of the path, turning in different directions, in search of a way out of this gloomy labyrinth. You are also given the opportunity to interact with interactive items that can be useful in solving puzzles or defending yourself from enemies.

As you move deeper into the labyrinth, your hero will begin to ask questions: who and why kidnapped him? What is the secret hidden in these dungeons? Will he be able to find the answers and get out of this tangled maze?



You have to solve this riddle, penetrate the secrets of the past and understand the true motives of the kidnapper. Together with your knight you will go on an exciting journey full of dangers and discoveries in order to find a way out of this labyrinth and uncover the secret of your kidnapping.

content_descriptors.notes: claustrophobia, blood, corpses, skeletons, terrible sounds, insects,

name: Fear Underground

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: intel core i5-2500 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

short_description: Left alone with the horror of the dungeon, the main character must uncover its secret. It is he who will become not only a test of strength and endurance, but also a guiding thread leading to the unraveling of the unknown forces guarding this secret.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Ukrainian, Japanese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
